comments:

Wasn't doing anything remarkable at the time - certainly nothing that I would 
expect would induce this...

Build id: 3.0 RC2

Can this be reproduced? If so, please attach the steps.

Has only happened this once to date.

Thought it was worth mentioning though because at the time I was only 
wandering around the file with the mouse - no actual builds or edits were in 
progress (notwithstanding the possibility that a background operation was 
ongoing)
*** Bug 67457 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

reviewed by Kai. Fix protects fReverseMap in CompilationUnitDocumentProvider
using the AnnotationModel's lock object.

Could not reproduce problem -> verified by code inspection:
all accesses to fReverseMap occur within a
synchronized (getLockObject()) { ... }
block.
